April 13, 2007

WiscWiki 2007 Conference Co-Organizer

WiscWiki 2007. Madison, WI.

Doug Worsham

Event Page

Abstract

Organized and delivered a successful University of Wisconsin system-wide conference allowing instructors and staff to share their knowledge and experience with using wikis for instruction, administration, and research.
